CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
OldVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
OldVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
OldVersion.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
OldVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
OldVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
OldVersion.description:
With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Glint Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: Enable managers and leaders to gather additional information and check in on team progress after an org-wide Glint survey. By leveraging a Pulse survey that recommends questions based on the top strengths and opportunities identified in the org-wide Glint survey, managers and leaders can gather a timely understanding of the team’s progress to-date in addressing key focus areas, make mid-point adjustments if needed, and maintain momentum in their efforts to improve engagement and employee experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Glint Dashboard
OldVersion.description: Enable managers and leaders to gather additional information and check in on team progress after an org-wide Glint survey. By leveraging a Pulse survey that recommends questions based on the top strengths and opportunities identified in the org-wide Glint survey, managers and leaders can gather a timely understanding of the team’s progress to-date in addressing key focus areas, make mid-point adjustments if needed, and maintain momentum in their efforts to improve engagement and employee experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Copilot summarization notification
CurrentVersion.description: The feature displays an Omnibox notification when users enter into a reading mode eligible page in Edge and offers them the option to open Copilot in the sidebar to generate a summary of the content.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Copilot summarization notification
OldVersion.description: The feature displays an Omnibox notification when users enter into a reading mode eligible page in Edge and offers them the option to open Copilot in the sidebar to generate a summary of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Dynamic watermarking is a new sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. This setting is supported for labels with admin-defined protection.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
OldVersion.description: Dynamic watermarking is a new sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. This setting is supported for labels with admin-defined protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
OldVersion.description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer—OneNote (Desktop) - Protected—for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
OldVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer—OneNote (Desktop) - Protected—for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse data available in Insights Analyst Workbench
CurrentVersion.description:
HR analysts and admins can access aggregated Pulse survey results across the organization and slice and dice the survey results to analyze Pulse survey results by organizational attributes (Ex. organizational hierarchy, job level, job function, geographic location, etc.).

This item is being removed as it is not scheduled at this time. We apologize for the inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse data available in Insights Analyst Workbench
OldVersion.description: HR analysts and admins can access aggregated Pulse survey results across the organization and slice and dice the survey results to analyze Pulse survey results by organizational attributes (Ex. organizational hierarchy, job level, job function, geographic location, etc.).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document size equals or is greater than, document name contains words or phrases, and document is password protected.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
OldVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document size equals or is greater than, document name contains words or phrases, and document is password protected.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Immersive Content Consumption Update
CurrentVersion.description: Current Learning Content details and Player page will be combined to give a more immersive consumption experience for users in Viva Learning. The update will impact all content details pages.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Immersive Inline Play update
OldVersion.description: Current Learning Content details and Player page will be combined to give a more immersive consumption experience for users in Viva Learning. The update will impact all content details pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When attending a meeting using a Teams Rooms on Windows device, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available on the Teams Rooms on Windows device for all in-tenant meetings. This feature requires the Teams Rooms Pro license.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
OldVersion.description: When attending a meeting using a Teams Rooms on Windows device, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available on the Teams Rooms on Windows device for all in-tenant meetings. This feature requires the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
OldVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
CurrentVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
OldVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Advanced Management - Restricted content discoverability
CurrentVersion.description: This is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities which allows SharePoint admins to restrict content discoverability in organization-wide search and Copilot experiences.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Advanced Management - Restricted content discoverability
OldVersion.description: This is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities which allows SharePoint admins to restrict content discoverability in organization-wide search and Copilot experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
CurrentVersion.description: Enables survey creators to associate custom questions with Glint standard questions to leverage benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. This customization ensures that survey creators can tailor Glint standard questions to their specific needs while gaining valuable insights from benchmark data.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
OldVersion.description: Enables survey creators to associate custom questions with Glint standard questions to leverage benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. This customization ensures that survey creators can tailor Glint standard questions to their specific needs while gaining valuable insights from benchmark data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
CurrentVersion.description: We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
OldVersion.description: We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
