Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
OldVersion.description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin usage reports for Loop
CurrentVersion.description: View and monitor Loop usage in the tenant through existing M365 admin usage dashboards.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin usage reports for Loop
OldVersion.description: View and monitor Loop usage in the tenant through existing M365 admin usage dashboards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated Context IQ menu in Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to Copilot Context IQ menu provides an intuitive and seamless interaction improving reliability and performance.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated Context IQ menu in Business Chat
OldVersion.description: Updates to Copilot Context IQ menu provides an intuitive and seamless interaction improving reliability and performance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – New personal Loop workspace
CurrentVersion.description: The Loop app now provides a personal workspace to all users, which is shared with Copilot Pages. This personal workspace is a user-owned SharePoint Embedded container, one per user. All governance, lifecycle management and compliance processes apply the same way they would to a user's OneDrive.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – New personal Loop workspace
OldVersion.description: The Loop app now provides a personal workspace to all users, which is shared with Copilot Pages. This personal workspace is a user-owned SharePoint Embedded container, one per user. All governance, lifecycle management and compliance processes apply the same way they would to a user's OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
CurrentVersion.description: Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
OldVersion.description: Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
OldVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
OldVersion.description: Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
CurrentVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
OldVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections insights and recommendations digest
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a periodic digest email to editors of Viva Connections, informing them of the analytics summary of their Connections experience and recommendations to improve engagement.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections insights and recommendations digest
OldVersion.description: This creates a periodic digest email to editors of Viva Connections, informing them of the analytics summary of their Connections experience and recommendations to improve engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Edit and schedule polls
CurrentVersion.description:
Users can schedule a poll for publication in Engage. Users can also edit a poll prior to publication, though once published, a poll is not editable.

This change brings the edit and schedule capability to polls, like all other post types in Engage (discussion, question, praise, and article).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Edit and schedule polls
OldVersion.description:
Users can schedule a poll for publication in Engage. Users can also edit a poll prior to publication, though once published, a poll is not editable.

This change brings the edit and schedule capability to polls, like all other post types in Engage (discussion, question, praise, and article).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Default enable transcription policy for new tenants for Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the default policy for Transcription in Teams meetings from “off” to “on” for any new tenant. This change doesn’t mean that every meeting will automatically have transcription enabled, but it will allow users to turn on transcription if needed. This update applies only to Teams meetings and does not affect transcription policies for calls. This adjustment aligns the default Transcription policy with that of Recording, supporting broader adoption of Transcription and all AI features.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Default enable transcription policy for new tenants for Teams meetings
OldVersion.description: We are updating the default policy for Transcription in Teams meetings from “off” to “on” for any new tenant. This change doesn’t mean that every meeting will automatically have transcription enabled, but it will allow users to turn on transcription if needed. This update applies only to Teams meetings and does not affect transcription policies for calls. This adjustment aligns the default Transcription policy with that of Recording, supporting broader adoption of Transcription and all AI features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Users within GCCH will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within GCCH
OldVersion.description: Users within GCCH will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - EXPORT ENHANCEMENTS
CurrentVersion.description: With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. Key changes with export enhancements: The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for eDiscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages. For Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. Additionally, customers will experience a faster export capability in the new portal driven through enhancements in backend architecture and optimized partition.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - EXPORT ENHANCEMENTS
OldVersion.description: With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. Key changes with export enhancements: The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for eDiscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages. For Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. Additionally, customers will experience a faster export capability in the new portal driven through enhancements in backend architecture and optimized partition.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
OldVersion.description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature update, eligible users will now be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks in Excel for the web. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web
OldVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature update, eligible users will now be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks in Excel for the web. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inadvertently changed the status to Rolling Out, but the correct status is Development. We apologize for the inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Enterprise News Reader
OldVersion.description: We apologize for the inconvenience; we are rolling back to In Development. This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, user’s followed sites, frequent sites and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot powered news summary as well, available in desktop only in this initial release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop –  Add a Loop Workspace to your Teams Channel
CurrentVersion.description: Channels in Microsoft Teams streamline collaboration by bringing people, content, and apps together and helping to organize them by project or topic. You will be able to add a Loop workspace tab to standard channels enabling your team to brainstorm, co-create, collect, and organize content—together in real-time. Everyone in the Team gets access to the Loop workspace, even as Team membership changes, and the workspace adheres to the governance, lifecycle, and compliance standards set by the Microsoft 365 Group backing the team. To get started, click the plus sign (+) at the top of the channel and select Loop from the app list.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop –  Add a Loop Workspace to your Teams Channel
OldVersion.description: Channels in Microsoft Teams streamline collaboration by bringing people, content, and apps together and helping to organize them by project or topic. You will be able to add a Loop workspace tab to standard channels enabling your team to brainstorm, co-create, collect, and organize content—together in real-time. Everyone in the Team gets access to the Loop workspace, even as Team membership changes, and the workspace adheres to the governance, lifecycle, and compliance standards set by the Microsoft 365 Group backing the team. To get started, click the plus sign (+) at the top of the channel and select Loop from the app list.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Third-Party chat and meeting keyboard shortcut support
CurrentVersion.description: Users familiar with keyboard shortcuts used in 3rd party applications chat and meeting applications can utilize the same shortcuts in Teams. To do this, access the keyboard shortcuts dialog from the Settings and more button in the upper right, and select a communication or meeting layout. This enables users to apply the shortcuts they are accustomed to from 3rd party chat and meeting applications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Third-Party chat and meeting keyboard shortcut support
OldVersion.description: Users familiar with keyboard shortcuts used in 3rd party applications chat and meeting applications can utilize the same shortcuts in Teams. To do this, access the keyboard shortcuts dialog from the Settings and more button in the upper right, and select a communication or meeting layout. This enables users to apply the shortcuts they are accustomed to from 3rd party chat and meeting applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting transcription supports multiple spoken languages
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting participants can now set their own spoken language during meetings, allowing each participant to communicate in their preferred language. Previously, Teams meetings required a common spoken language to generate a transcript. With this update, a meeting transcript can be accurately generated reflecting each participant’s language of choice.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Users within DoD will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within DoD
OldVersion.description: Users within DoD will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Zero downtime for Viva Glint releases
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Glint releases previously needed several hours of downtime. With this feature, future releases will be transparent to customers, requiring no downtime planning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Zero downtime for Viva Glint releases
OldVersion.description: Viva Glint releases previously needed several hours of downtime. With this feature, future releases will be transparent to customers, requiring no downtime planning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Occupancy status on Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: Teams panels can now smartly utilize signals from Teams Rooms devices or occupancy sensors paired with panels to indicate when a room is in use (e.g. LED glow), so you’re not surprised to find an available room is actually occupied.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Occupancy status on Teams panels
OldVersion.description: Teams panels can now smartly utilize signals from Teams Rooms devices or occupancy sensors paired with panels to indicate when a room is in use (e.g. LED glow), so you’re not surprised to find an available room is actually occupied.

CurrentVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Garden Awakens Update (Cancelled)
CurrentVersion.description:
We are delaying this GA until the Summer to ensure high stability on the release. We will instead be releasing a minor update in March that will include Code Builder stability improvements and a fix for freezes on MacOS. 

Keep in mind that in our Summer release we will be deprecating AZNB & Tynker in Minecraft Education's code builder.

OldVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Garden Awakens Update v1.21.5
OldVersion.description: This update includes improvements to OneDrive cloud storage, multiplayer, and coding. It also includes Minecraft features up to version 1.21.5 like Bundles, the Pale Garden biome, and the reorganized Creative Inventory.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature, users with access to Excel for Windows will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

OldVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel
OldVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature, users with access to Excel for Windows will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, insights will be generated for potentially risky behaviors at a user level and will be surfaced across the following experiences:

1) Insider risk management context in DLP alert investigation
2) Insider risk management context in Communication compliance alert investigation
3) Insider risk management context in Microsoft Defender XDR user entity page
4) Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender XDR  

User analytics will cover all eligible users in the tenant including users not in the scope of any Insider risk management policy. Customers can enable/disable user analytics in their tenant from Insider Risk Management settings.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Insider risk management user analytics
OldVersion.description: With this feature, Insights will be generated for potentially risky behaviors at a user level and will be surfaced across the following experiences: 1) Insider risk management context in DLP alert investigation 2) Insider risk management context in Communication compliance alert investigation 3) Insider risk management context in Microsoft Defender XDR user entity page 4) Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender XDR. User analytics will cover all eligible users in the tenant including users not in the scope of any Insider risk management policy. During the initial rollout, user analytics will be enabled by default for all customers who have enabled Insider risk management analytics. This will help customers benefit from this additional intelligence right from the start. Customers can enable/disable user analytics in your tenant from Insider risk management Global settings. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Once you integrate your organization's assets into a Sharepoint OAL (Organization Asset Library) you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
OldVersion.description: Once you integrate your organization's assets into a Sharepoint OAL (Organization Asset Library) you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: CVI support for Townhall and Webinar presenters
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can now join Teams Townhall and Teams Webinar sessions using third-party video teleconferencing devices (VTC) through Cloud Video Interop (CVI) coordinates provided in presenter invites.  Only trusted CVI devices can join the event and use presenter features like Green Room.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: CVI support for Townhall and Webinar presenters
OldVersion.description: Presenters can now join Teams Townhall and Teams Webinar sessions using third-party video teleconferencing devices (VTC) through Cloud Video Interop (CVI) coordinates provided in presenter invites.  Only trusted CVI devices can join the event and use presenter features like Green Room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Once you connect your asset library hosted with Templafy to Microsoft 365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support for summarization of very long documents
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word can summarize documents up to about 1,500,000 words or 3,000 pages. This summary will be available on top of the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support for summarization of very long documents
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word can summarize documents up to about 1,500,000 words or 3,000 pages. This summary will be available on top of the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support Import and Export of S/MIME digital certificates in New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users who do not have S/MIME digital certificates installed now can use Import functionality to install S/MIME certificate files into their Windows machine. Similarly, Export functionality can be used to export S/MIME certificates with new password. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Translated Intelligent meeting recap
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap supports meetings where multiple languages were spoken, making it easy for you to catch up quickly on the key points discussed. After a meeting where participants spoke different languages, your intelligent meeting recap will automatically be generated in the language you chose during the meeting. After your recap is generated, you can still change the translation language to the language of your choice from the translation drop-down menu on the recap page.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Users can authenticate to Windows 365 using passkeys (FIDO2) on Android
CurrentVersion.description: This allows Windows 365 users to use passkeys (FIDO2) on Android. This feature will align with Windows App on Android GA.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhancing usability for the frontline
CurrentVersion.description: We are enhancing the default experience for Frontline Workers by making it easier to connect with their organization and introducing more intuitive app names. These updates include adding the Communities experience into the Tailored Frontline App Experience and renaming apps for greater clarity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meetings responses can be exported to Word and Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Now, certain responses from Copilot in Teams meetings will have an option to ‘edit in’ Word or Excel. The ‘edit in’ option for Word will be available for Copilot responses that are long (more than 1300 characters) and will automatically open a Word document with the response written. The ‘edit in’ option for Excel will be available for Copilot responses that are formatted in a table, and will automatically open an Excel file with the formatted response added. Copilot responses can only be exported if the meeting policy for the meeting is set to allow copying or forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, transcript, and Copilot responses. The export capability will also inherit the sensitivity label of the meeting (sensitivity labels are available to Teams Premium users).

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate with Apple Pencil Experience on OneDrive for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Annotating with hand-drawn content in the OneDrive apps for iOS and iPadOS is now easier than ever. Enjoy various types of annotation tools and expressive strokes that match your pressure.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate with Apple Pencil Experience on OneDrive for iOS
OldVersion.description: Coming soon to Microsoft OneDrive: OneDrive iOS users will be able to use Apple original pencil toolkit to create, edit, and manage PDF annotations. This integration will provide users with advanced, low-latency tools that align with Apple Pencil experience, making it easier and more enjoyable for iOS users to annotate PDFs within OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ camera controls for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: If the camera is not currently auto-framing the room, in-room users can now control the Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) of the active camera to keep the focus where they want it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint Quota Consumption and recommendations
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows organizations to monitor Microsoft 365 SharePoint Quota Consumption and their usage growth over time. It enhances the report by providing single pane access to the above metrics along with recommendations to storage decluttering and storage optimization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Simplified Notes pane in meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We’re updating the Notes pane in meetings to streamline the design and make key controls more clear. First, we’re renaming the header from ‘Meeting notes’ to ‘Notes’ to match the pane’s name in the meeting toolbar.  Second, the file-level controls like “Open in new window” and “Copy component” are combined into a single header at the top for simplicity. As part of the single header, the control to open the component in the Loop web app will be found in the ellipses menu in the top header and no longer in the Pages icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Standard and Basic licensed Teams rooms in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Rooms Pro Management portal now supports and enforces licenses for devices in rooms using Standard and Basic licenses. IT now has a unified admin experience and can manage these devices with functions similar to those of the Teams admin center through the Pro Management portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing several enhancements to the eDiscovery modernized user interface. These updates include a comprehensive case-level data source view, the ability to retry failed locations for a more complete search statistics estimate, and the capability to view process reports across all cases. Users will also be able to duplicate search and copy search from hold or hold from search within the same case, reusing the data sources and queries. Additionally, customers will be able to access a more comprehensive reporting in all process reports including information like compliance boundary, encryption settings and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot only during call
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot is only available during the live call session and will not be accessible after the call ends. No recording or transcription is required to use Copilot during the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Opening Calls in a small window in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Allowing users to open calls in a small window to reduce disruptions in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in PowerPoint will rewrite paragraphs into bullet points or lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
CurrentVersion.description: PowerPoint is introducing Copilot text editing, allowing you to convert paragraphs into bullet points or lists effortlessly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Restricted Access Control Enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: New enhancements for RAC policy for SharePoint administrators to restrict access to SharePoint sites including managing M365 group connected sites with M365 groups or Security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings will be available int he unfurled links.
CurrentVersion.description: App ratings will appear on the unfurled links for shared apps and agents to allow users who rely on ratings to evaluate apps prior to installing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP support - Just-in-time on MacOS
CurrentVersion.description: This feature ensures that policy tips are displayed only after recipients are added to an email, minimizing user disruption from DLP policy tips. With this improvement, relevant policy tips are only shown to users as they draft emails after the proper policy conditions are met.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share apps from app bar via right click
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to right-click and share apps directly from the app icon on hover, while using the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Availability of 'Add' and 'view details' buttons on unfurled links.
CurrentVersion.description: Option to 'Add' and 'View details' for an app will appear in the unfurled links for seamless installation of apps & agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): M365 Copilot for GCC Environments: Wave 2
CurrentVersion.description: Bringing Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC your AI assistant for work in the GCC environment. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, to help you draft and rewrite, summarize and organize, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. Copilot generates answers using the rich, people-centric data and insights available in the Microsoft Graph. Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC is now available in Stream, SharePoint, OneNote, and Pages in Loop.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Integrate Chat notification with Meeting RSVP status
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Teams users will be able to control how they get notified in meeting chats through RSVP to their meetings. When you decline a meeting, you will not receive notifications or see the chats in chat list; when you accept a meeting, you will receive notification for all new messages.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Microsoft Forms Poll Loop component live copy/paste
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to copy/paste existing Microsoft Forms Poll Loop components into Whiteboard and vice versa.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy deletion enhancement
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, admins with appropriate permissions can delete all associated alerts, cases, and users in scope when deleting a policy to help quickly reset and remove inactive policies.  

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Skin tone setting and reactions
CurrentVersion.description: In Teams settings, users have the option to select their preferred skin tone. This preference will be applied to all emojis and reactions in chats, channels, and meetings, allowing users to express themselves more authentically in conversations.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Promote members to owners in Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: Loop workspaces support multiple owners, allowing end users to promote members to owners.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams Rooms Windows Devices support for presenters in town halls
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can join and present from a Microsoft Teams Room (MTR) Windows device in a town hall.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Risky AI usage
CurrentVersion.description:
With this update, Insider risk management will help admins identify risky AI usage. We are adding new detections of intentional and unintentional insider risk activity on generative AI apps that can pose a risk to an organization. Activities will include risky prompts containing sensitive info or risky intent and sensitive responses containing sensitive info or is generated from sensitive files or sites.  Coverage will span across Microsoft Copilots and 3P generative AI apps. These detections will also contribute to Adaptive Protection insider risk levels.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse – Integration into Viva Glint Dashboard
CurrentVersion.description: Enable managers and leaders to gather additional information and check in on team progress after an org-wide Glint survey. By leveraging a Pulse survey that recommends questions based on the top strengths and opportunities identified in the org-wide Glint survey, managers and leaders can gather a timely understanding of the team’s progress to-date in addressing key focus areas, make mid-point adjustments if needed, and maintain momentum in their efforts to improve engagement and employee experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Copilot summarization notification
CurrentVersion.description: The feature displays an Omnibox notification when users enter into a reading mode eligible page in Edge and offers them the option to open Copilot in the sidebar to generate a summary of the content.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Dynamic watermarking for files protected with sensitivity labels
CurrentVersion.description: Dynamic watermarking is a new sensitivity label setting that overlays watermark text containing the consuming user’s information on content in Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. This setting is supported for labels with admin-defined protection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Video creation in Copilot Visual Creator powered by Clipchamp
CurrentVersion.description: Clipchamp brings video creation skills to Visual Creator in Copilot. Type your prompt and Clipchamp will write a bespoke script, source high quality stock footage, and assemble a video project with music, voiceover, text overlays and transitions. Open your video project draft in Clipchamp app to continue editing, export and share. Great for informational videos, video messaging, how-to, demo and video presentations.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: Windows app - New protected virtual printer
CurrentVersion.description: This creates the new virtual printer—OneNote (Desktop) - Protected—for OneNote Windows app, built on top of the Microsoft IPP class print driver. This printer will be compliant and functional with Widows Protected Print (WPP) mode.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse data available in Insights Analyst Workbench
CurrentVersion.description:
HR analysts and admins can access aggregated Pulse survey results across the organization and slice and dice the survey results to analyze Pulse survey results by organizational attributes (Ex. organizational hierarchy, job level, job function, geographic location, etc.).

This item is being removed as it is not scheduled at this time. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Cross workload predicate support on Mac Endpoints (File size, partially scannable, etc.)
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, admins can extend these mentioned predicates to Microsoft Purview DLP for Endpoint: document is unscannable, document didn't complete scanning, document size equals or is greater than, document name contains words or phrases, and document is password protected.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Immersive Content Consumption Update
CurrentVersion.description: Current Learning Content details and Player page will be combined to give a more immersive consumption experience for users in Viva Learning. The update will impact all content details pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Start/stop recording on Teams Rooms on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: When attending a meeting using a Teams Rooms on Windows device, users can now start or stop recording without having to join on their companion device. The start/stop recording button will be available on the Teams Rooms on Windows device for all in-tenant meetings. This feature requires the Teams Rooms Pro license.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ground prompts using SharePoint and OneDrive Folders
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to select SharePoint and ODSP Folders from the new "Attach cloud files" experience in CIQ to scope their prompts to.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
CurrentVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Advanced Management - Restricted content discoverability
CurrentVersion.description: This is part of SharePoint Advanced Management capabilities which allows SharePoint admins to restrict content discoverability in organization-wide search and Copilot experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
CurrentVersion.description: Enables survey creators to associate custom questions with Glint standard questions to leverage benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. This customization ensures that survey creators can tailor Glint standard questions to their specific needs while gaining valuable insights from benchmark data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Diagnostics in the new portal
CurrentVersion.description: We are building UX to surface the diagnostics that were previously available through cmdlet to be accessible through portal UX.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Ability to increase configuration of CPU and GPU device resource utilization limits in Forensic Evidence
CurrentVersion.description:
Insider Risk Management Administrators will now be able to increase the CPU and GPU device resource utilization limit for all devices uploading Forensic Evidence clips in their organization. Forensic Evidence will now allow up to 31% CPU and GPU device resource utilization, up from the prior maximum limit of 5%. This enhancement reduces interruptions in the recording and uploading of clips.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Delivery and read receipts in Outlook mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Now you will be able to request both delivery and read receipts while composing an email in Outlook for iOS and Android. You will also easily be able to respond to requests for read receipts on emails you receive and set preferences for future read receipts.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Admin usage reports for Loop
CurrentVersion.description: View and monitor Loop usage in the tenant through existing M365 admin usage dashboards.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Updated Context IQ menu in Business Chat
CurrentVersion.description: Updates to Copilot Context IQ menu provides an intuitive and seamless interaction improving reliability and performance.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – New personal Loop workspace
CurrentVersion.description: The Loop app now provides a personal workspace to all users, which is shared with Copilot Pages. This personal workspace is a user-owned SharePoint Embedded container, one per user. All governance, lifecycle management and compliance processes apply the same way they would to a user's OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop – Ideas Workspace Functions as a Shared Loop workspace
CurrentVersion.description: Loop Ideas workspaces are tenant-managed like SharePoint Communication sites. They appear with existing Loop workspaces, with all features such as adding members and organizing pages

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Shifts Graph APIs in beta moved to production (v1.0)
CurrentVersion.description: We are excited to announce that the Shifts Graph APIs have transitioned from beta to production. This change brings enhanced stability and reliability to the APIs, ensuring a seamless experience for developers and users alike.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Ability to request delegate access in Viva Insights
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Insights users will now be able request delegate access from a Manager in the Insights Teams or Web app. Previously, Managers could assign delegates, but potential delegates could not request access from a Manager. This request access update will allow for increased ease & flexibility of providing delegate access in Insights.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Microsoft Purview AI Hub – Data Assessments
CurrentVersion.description: Data assessments in Microsoft Purview AI Hub provides a way for admins to drive data security outcomes by creating scoped assessments, reviewing the data sensitivity and user accesses on locations, and performing remediation actions to mitigate risk.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Connections insights and recommendations digest
CurrentVersion.description: This creates a periodic digest email to editors of Viva Connections, informing them of the analytics summary of their Connections experience and recommendations to improve engagement.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage - Edit and schedule polls
CurrentVersion.description:
Users can schedule a poll for publication in Engage. Users can also edit a poll prior to publication, though once published, a poll is not editable.

This change brings the edit and schedule capability to polls, like all other post types in Engage (discussion, question, praise, and article).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Default enable transcription policy for new tenants for Teams meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the default policy for Transcription in Teams meetings from “off” to “on” for any new tenant. This change doesn’t mean that every meeting will automatically have transcription enabled, but it will allow users to turn on transcription if needed. This update applies only to Teams meetings and does not affect transcription policies for calls. This adjustment aligns the default Transcription policy with that of Recording, supporting broader adoption of Transcription and all AI features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within GCCH
CurrentVersion.description: Users within GCCH will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - EXPORT ENHANCEMENTS
CurrentVersion.description: With the export of data being one of the core fundamentals of the solution, Microsoft Purview eDiscovery team is excited to announce significant changes coming to the export feature along with the new user experience in purview.microsoft.com. Key changes with export enhancements: The biggest change being introduced is that with the new user experience for eDiscovery where Standard and Premium cases have unified structure, the export is also aligned for both the streams – thereby providing a singular experience to customers. The behavior is now unified across all export jobs - same download experience, some report experience, same error messages. For Standard customers, the need to install a clickonce application in their machine and use that tool to download data for exporting in azure storage is history. Now, in the new experience, customers don’t need to install the app anymore and can download directly through browser. Additionally, customers will experience a faster export capability in the new portal driven through enhancements in backend architecture and optimized partition.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages authoring accessibility checker
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint Accessibility Assistant empowers content creators to ensure their SharePoint Pages meet accessibility standards.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel for the web
CurrentVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature update, eligible users will now be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks in Excel for the web. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - New News feature in Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: This update will replace the current Feed experience in Viva Connections across desktop, mobile, and web platforms with a SharePoint News reader experience. This new experience will present SharePoint news from the organizational sites, boosted news, users' followed sites, frequent sites, and people they work with in an immersive reader experience. This will include a Copilot-powered news summary as well, available only in Teams for Windows desktop in this initial release. February 2025: We inadvertently changed the status to Rolling Out, but the correct status is Development. We apologize for the inconvenience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop –  Add a Loop Workspace to your Teams Channel
CurrentVersion.description: Channels in Microsoft Teams streamline collaboration by bringing people, content, and apps together and helping to organize them by project or topic. You will be able to add a Loop workspace tab to standard channels enabling your team to brainstorm, co-create, collect, and organize content—together in real-time. Everyone in the Team gets access to the Loop workspace, even as Team membership changes, and the workspace adheres to the governance, lifecycle, and compliance standards set by the Microsoft 365 Group backing the team. To get started, click the plus sign (+) at the top of the channel and select Loop from the app list.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Third-Party chat and meeting keyboard shortcut support
CurrentVersion.description: Users familiar with keyboard shortcuts used in 3rd party applications chat and meeting applications can utilize the same shortcuts in Teams. To do this, access the keyboard shortcuts dialog from the Settings and more button in the upper right, and select a communication or meeting layout. This enables users to apply the shortcuts they are accustomed to from 3rd party chat and meeting applications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting transcription supports multiple spoken languages
CurrentVersion.description: Meeting participants can now set their own spoken language during meetings, allowing each participant to communicate in their preferred language. Previously, Teams meetings required a common spoken language to generate a transcript. With this update, a meeting transcript can be accurately generated reflecting each participant’s language of choice.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Approvals in Teams within DoD
CurrentVersion.description: Users within DoD will now be able to use the Approvals app within Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Zero downtime for Viva Glint releases
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Glint releases previously needed several hours of downtime. With this feature, future releases will be transparent to customers, requiring no downtime planning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Occupancy status on Teams panels
CurrentVersion.description: Teams panels can now smartly utilize signals from Teams Rooms devices or occupancy sensors paired with panels to indicate when a room is in use (e.g. LED glow), so you’re not surprised to find an available room is actually occupied.

CurrentVersion.title: Minecraft Education: Garden Awakens Update (Cancelled)
CurrentVersion.description:
We are delaying this GA until the Summer to ensure high stability on the release. We will instead be releasing a minor update in March that will include Code Builder stability improvements and a fix for freezes on MacOS. 

Keep in mind that in our Summer release we will be deprecating AZNB & Tynker in Minecraft Education's code builder.

CurrentVersion.title: Excel: Python in Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Python in Excel allows you to bring the capabilities of Python directly into the Excel grid. As a part of this feature, users with access to Excel for Windows will be able to add Python formulas directly into their workbooks without any installation required. These Python formulas will be run by Excel in a secure container on the Microsoft Cloud with enterprise-level security as a compliant Microsoft 365 connected experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - User analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
With this feature, insights will be generated for potentially risky behaviors at a user level and will be surfaced across the following experiences:

1) Insider risk management context in DLP alert investigation
2) Insider risk management context in Communication compliance alert investigation
3) Insider risk management context in Microsoft Defender XDR user entity page
4) Advanced hunting in Microsoft Defender XDR  

User analytics will cover all eligible users in the tenant including users not in the scope of any Insider risk management policy. Customers can enable/disable user analytics in their tenant from Insider Risk Management settings.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses enterprise assets hosted on SharePoint OAL when creating presentations with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Once you integrate your organization's assets into a Sharepoint OAL (Organization Asset Library) you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Share user risk details with other security solutions [Government customers only]
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management is introducing sharing Insider Risk Management data with other Microsoft services for Government customers. When turned on, admins with the correct permissions will be able to review user risk details and alerts from Insider Risk Management within other solutions such as Data Loss Prevention (DLP), Communication Compliance, and Microsoft Defender.

Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: CVI support for Townhall and Webinar presenters
CurrentVersion.description: Presenters can now join Teams Townhall and Teams Webinar sessions using third-party video teleconferencing devices (VTC) through Cloud Video Interop (CVI) coordinates provided in presenter invites.  Only trusted CVI devices can join the event and use presenter features like Green Room.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Copilot uses Enterprise assets hosted on Templafy when creating presentations with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Once you connect your asset library hosted with Templafy to Microsoft 365 and Copilot, you will be able to create presentations with your organization's images.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support for summarization of very long documents
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word can summarize documents up to about 1,500,000 words or 3,000 pages. This summary will be available on top of the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Support for summarization of very long documents
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word can summarize documents up to about 1,500,000 words or 3,000 pages. This summary will be available on top of the document.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support Import and Export of S/MIME digital certificates in New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Users who do not have S/MIME digital certificates installed now can use Import functionality to install S/MIME certificate files into their Windows machine. Similarly, Export functionality can be used to export S/MIME certificates with new password. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Translated Intelligent meeting recap
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent meeting recap supports meetings where multiple languages were spoken, making it easy for you to catch up quickly on the key points discussed. After a meeting where participants spoke different languages, your intelligent meeting recap will automatically be generated in the language you chose during the meeting. After your recap is generated, you can still change the translation language to the language of your choice from the translation drop-down menu on the recap page.

CurrentVersion.title: Windows 365: Users can authenticate to Windows 365 using passkeys (FIDO2) on Android
CurrentVersion.description: This allows Windows 365 users to use passkeys (FIDO2) on Android. This feature will align with Windows App on Android GA.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhancing usability for the frontline
CurrentVersion.description: We are enhancing the default experience for Frontline Workers by making it easier to connect with their organization and introducing more intuitive app names. These updates include adding the Communities experience into the Tailored Frontline App Experience and renaming apps for greater clarity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot in Teams meetings responses can be exported to Word and Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Now, certain responses from Copilot in Teams meetings will have an option to ‘edit in’ Word or Excel. The ‘edit in’ option for Word will be available for Copilot responses that are long (more than 1300 characters) and will automatically open a Word document with the response written. The ‘edit in’ option for Excel will be available for Copilot responses that are formatted in a table, and will automatically open an Excel file with the formatted response added. Copilot responses can only be exported if the meeting policy for the meeting is set to allow copying or forwarding of meeting chat, live captions, transcript, and Copilot responses. The export capability will also inherit the sensitivity label of the meeting (sensitivity labels are available to Teams Premium users).

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Annotate with Apple Pencil Experience on OneDrive for iOS
CurrentVersion.description: Annotating with hand-drawn content in the OneDrive apps for iOS and iPadOS is now easier than ever. Enjoy various types of annotation tools and expressive strokes that match your pressure.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Local PTZ camera controls for Microsoft Teams Rooms on Android
CurrentVersion.description: If the camera is not currently auto-framing the room, in-room users can now control the Pan-Tilt-Zoom (PTZ) of the active camera to keep the focus where they want it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Usage reports - SharePoint Quota Consumption and recommendations
CurrentVersion.description: This feature allows organizations to monitor Microsoft 365 SharePoint Quota Consumption and their usage growth over time. It enhances the report by providing single pane access to the above metrics along with recommendations to storage decluttering and storage optimization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams:  Simplified Notes pane in meetings
CurrentVersion.description: We’re updating the Notes pane in meetings to streamline the design and make key controls more clear. First, we’re renaming the header from ‘Meeting notes’ to ‘Notes’ to match the pane’s name in the meeting toolbar.  Second, the file-level controls like “Open in new window” and “Copy component” are combined into a single header at the top for simplicity. As part of the single header, the control to open the component in the Loop web app will be found in the ellipses menu in the top header and no longer in the Pages icon.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Standard and Basic licensed Teams rooms in the Pro Management portal
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Rooms Pro Management portal now supports and enforces licenses for devices in rooms using Standard and Basic licenses. IT now has a unified admin experience and can manage these devices with functions similar to those of the Teams admin center through the Pro Management portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing several enhancements to the eDiscovery modernized user interface. These updates include a comprehensive case-level data source view, the ability to retry failed locations for a more complete search statistics estimate, and the capability to view process reports across all cases. Users will also be able to duplicate search and copy search from hold or hold from search within the same case, reusing the data sources and queries. Additionally, customers will be able to access a more comprehensive reporting in all process reports including information like compliance boundary, encryption settings and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Copilot only during call
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot is only available during the live call session and will not be accessible after the call ends. No recording or transcription is required to use Copilot during the call.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Opening Calls in a small window in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Allowing users to open calls in a small window to reduce disruptions in Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in PowerPoint will rewrite paragraphs into bullet points or lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Ask Copilot to rewrite text as a list
CurrentVersion.description: PowerPoint is introducing Copilot text editing, allowing you to convert paragraphs into bullet points or lists effortlessly.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Schedule from email with Copilot
CurrentVersion.description: Often you may want to transition a conversation from an email thread to a meeting. Copilot helps you do this by being able to start scheduling right from the email conversation. It saves you time and effort by generating a meeting invite that's ready for you to review and send. When you click on "Schedule with Copilot" a meeting form will appear with a Copilot generated meeting title, agenda, and conversation summary as well as a pre-filled attendee list from the email thread and an attachment of the original email thread. This feature will be available in the new Outlook for Windows, web, Mac, and mobile. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Restricted Access Control Enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: New enhancements for RAC policy for SharePoint administrators to restrict access to SharePoint sites including managing M365 group connected sites with M365 groups or Security groups.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: App ratings will be available int he unfurled links.
CurrentVersion.description: App ratings will appear on the unfurled links for shared apps and agents to allow users who rely on ratings to evaluate apps prior to installing.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint DLP support - Just-in-time on MacOS
CurrentVersion.description: This feature ensures that policy tips are displayed only after recipients are added to an email, minimizing user disruption from DLP policy tips. With this improvement, relevant policy tips are only shown to users as they draft emails after the proper policy conditions are met.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Share apps from app bar via right click
CurrentVersion.description: Allow users to right-click and share apps directly from the app icon on hover, while using the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Availability of 'Add' and 'view details' buttons on unfurled links.
CurrentVersion.description: Option to 'Add' and 'View details' for an app will appear in the unfurled links for seamless installation of apps & agents.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): M365 Copilot for GCC Environments: Wave 2
CurrentVersion.description: Bringing Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC your AI assistant for work in the GCC environment. It combines the power of Large Language Models with your work content and context, to help you draft and rewrite, summarize and organize, catch up on what you missed, and get answers to questions via open prompts. Copilot generates answers using the rich, people-centric data and insights available in the Microsoft Graph. Microsoft 365 Copilot GCC is now available in Stream, SharePoint, OneNote, and Pages in Loop.
